R0_StudyID.name: StudyID
R0_StudyID.description: Unique 6-digit identifier for each participant in the study.

R0_NonBCTamoxRaloxUse.name: Q8_11_1_1
R0_NonBCTamoxRaloxUse.question: Other than for the treatment of breast cancer, have you ever used or are you currently using the drugs tamoxifen (Soltamox, Nolvadex-D, or Tamofen) or raloxifene (Evista)?
R0_NonBCTamoxRaloxUse.description: Participant's use of tamoxifen (Soltamox, Nolvadex-D, or Tamofen) or raloxifene (Evista).

R0_NonBCDrugType.name: Q8_11_2_1
R0_NonBCDrugType.question: If yes, which drug did you use? (Tamoxifen, Raloxifene)
R0_NonBCDrugType.description: Which drug, tamoxifen or raloxifene, the participant used.

R0_NonBCDrugStartAge.name: Q8_11_3
R0_NonBCDrugStartAge.question: At what age did you first use it?
R0_NonBCDrugStartAge.description: At what age the participant began using the drug.

R0_NonBCDrugDurationYrs.name: Q8_11_4
R0_NonBCDrugDurationYrs.question: For how long in total did you use it? - Years
R0_NonBCDrugDurationYrs.description: The duration, in years, that the participant was using the drug.

R0_NonBCDrugDurationMnths.name: Q8_11_5
R0_NonBCDrugDurationMnths.question: For how long in total did you use it? - Months
R0_NonBCDrugDurationMnths.description: If years were not round, how many months of top of the year the participant was using the drug.

R0_NonBCDrugOngoing.name: Q8_11_6
R0_NonBCDrugOngoing.question: For how long in total did you use it? - Still using
R0_NonBCDrugOngoing.description: Indicator that the participant is still using the drug.

R0_NonBCDrugEpisodes.name: Q8_11_7
R0_NonBCDrugEpisodes.question: If you have used these drugs for more than one episode, please provide details.
R0_NonBCDrugEpisodes.description: Indicator whether the participant has used these drugs for more than one episode.
enumDescriptions: 1: If you have used these drugs for more than one episode, please provide details.

R0_AcneMedsStartAge.description: Starting age of the participant for taking acne pills or tablets.

AspirinRegularUse.name: AspirinRegularUse
AspirinRegularUse.description: Occurrences where participant took aspirin regularly (daily or almost daily for 6 months).
